Blacknightmare::

She walked some steps towards Orchestra and with her best smile she 
said "Relax, It will be fast and all will be ok"

She closed the door and walked towards the controls. "Ready??" she 
asked.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:


> ::Composer/Orchestra::
> 
>       Composer nodded.
> 
>        "Ya, you never know when a deep-sea assault will break out!" 
He said.
> 
>        Then, Composer thought of something.
> 
>         "Hey Wheeljack, what if we were to place some sort of 
lasers or turrets deep enough under the water but shallow enough to 
hit targets?  What I'm saying is, what if we put defence turrets 
hidden underwater so enemies can't see them, and when our enemies 
approach within a certain range, the turrets fire up at the surface.  
The water could be great to hide weapons and stuff too," He said some 
of his ideas.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Orchestra walks carefully into the reprogramation chamber.
> 
>          "Let's do it," He said.
